definitions.definition: A male peafowl , especially Pavo cristatus , notable for its brilliant iridescently ocellated tail.
A peafowl (of the genus Pavo or Afropavo ), either male or female.
A pompous or vainglorious person [from the 14th c.] .
Any of various Asian species of papilionid butterflies of the genus Papilio .

main_definition: A male peafowl , especially Pavo cristatus , notable for its brilliant iridescently ocellated tail.
secondary_definitions: A peafowl (of the genus Pavo or Afropavo ), either male or female.
A pompous or vainglorious person [from the 14th c.] .
( entomology ) Any of various Asian species of papilionid butterflies of the genus Papilio .
